deprecated_yaml_invalid_token.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed.

Your configuration couldn't be imported because the token in the configuration.yaml was invalid.

Please add Twitch again via the UI.

Remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

Please add Twitch again via the UI.
